summary: Professor Gangreen attempts to brainwash the world; a police assistant and a tomatologist team up to stop him.
cast: Debi Fares|Rick Rockwell|John Witherspoon|John Astin|Crystal Carson|J. Stephen Peace|Steve Lundquist|Zollo Cortez|John De Bello|Thomas W. Ashworth|Cal Worthington|Robin Abb|Lane Post|'Squeeze' Del Monte|'Seedy' Heinz|D.J. Sullivan|Kevin West|Frank Davis|Craig Lefferts|Jack Owen|Spike Sorrentino|Kelley Matzenauer|Costa Dillon|Charlie Jones|Lisa Kaseman|Michael Hoey|Margaret Sutton
title: Los tomates asesinos atacan de nuevo
